title: Changelog
text: notable changes rnaseqDegy documented file. format follows Keep Changelog (https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.1.0/) project adheres Semantic Versioning (https://semver.org/).

title: Changelog
text: Initial release rnaseqDegy, unified bulk RNA-seq pipeline R package. Count filtering (‚â•10 counts ‚â•50% samples). QC: PCA (/without batch correction), sample correlation heatmap, top 500 variable-gene heatmap. Differential expression (DESeq2 edgeR) batch correction integrated design. Enhanced volcano plots gene counts top 10 labels. ORA (GO BP/MF/CC) via clusterProfiler (dotplot, barplot, cnetplot, emapplot). GSEA using user-supplied offline GMT files (dotplot, barplot, cnetplot, emapplot). Added run_rnaseqDegy() high-level wrapper function R workflow integration. Internal modular engine located inst/scripts/engine_internal.R. Added comprehensive documentation roxygen tags. README.md LICENSE (MIT) CITATION.cff CONTRIBUTING.md NAMESPACE DESCRIPTION

title: Changelog
text: first stable functional version package. Future versions expand enrichment options (KEGG, Reactome), introduce multi-contrast support, add automated HTML reporting.

title: Changelog
text: Support KEGG/Reactome ORA + GSEA. Optional batch-aware normalization choices (e.g., RUVseq, ComBat‚ÄëSeq). Multi-contrast DE support. Automated QC/DE report (HTML via rmarkdown). Extending species support (rat, drosophila). Shiny app wrapper interactive use.

what: üöÄ Unified Bulk RNA‚Äëseq QC, Differential Expression, and Enrichment Pipeline
title: rnaseqDegy
text: Author: Dr.¬†Eric Bareke (Majewski Lab, McGill University)Repository: https://github.com/ebareke/rnaseqDegy rnaseqDegy R package providing single, fully automated pipeline bulk RNA‚Äëseq analysis ‚Äî covering QC, differential expression, GO ORA, GSEA using user‚Äësupplied GMT files, human mouse datasets. package designed research labs, HPC clusters, automated workflows, offering clean, reproducible, publication‚Äëready outputs.

title: rnaseqDegy
text: Count filtering (‚â•10 counts ‚â•50% samples) PCA (optional batch correction via limma::removeBatchEffect) Sample correlation heatmap (Pearson/Spearman/Kendall) Top 500 variable gene heatmap Auto‚Äëdimensioned plots publication‚Äëready styling

text: Accepts custom GMT file Dotplot, barplot, cnetplot, emapplot Auto‚Äëfiltered term subset via gmt_terms

title: rnaseqDegy
text: package requires Bioconductor dependencies. Install everything cleanly :
code: # Install devtools if not present install.packages("devtools")  # Install rnaseqDegy from GitHub devtools::install_github("ebareke/rnaseqDegy")

title: rnaseqDegy
text: generate: - QC plots - DE tables + volcano - ORA (BP/MF/CC) - GSEA (GMT) Outputs auto‚Äënamed saved PDF + PNG.
code: library(rnaseqDegy)  run_rnaseqDegy(   counts = "counts.tsv",   design = "design.tsv",   species = "human",   de_method = "DESeq2",   condition_reference = "Control",   condition_test = "Mutant",   batch_correction = TRUE,   run_ora = TRUE,   run_gsea = TRUE,   gmt_dir = "gmt/",   gmt_files = c("HALLMARK.gmt", "GO_BP.gmt"),   output_dir = "results/Control_vs_Mutant",   prefix = "C_vs_M" )

title: rnaseqDegy
text: First column: GeneID (Ensembl Symbol) Following columns: raw integer counts

title: run_rnaseqDegy ‚Äî run_rnaseqDegy
text: Unified bulk RNA-seq pipeline QC, DE (DESeq2/edgeR), ORA GSEA. Accepts file paths parameters R function arguments (wrapper around original CLI pipeline). outputs written chosen directory.

title: run_rnaseqDegy ‚Äî run_rnaseqDegy
code: run_rnaseqDegy(   counts,   design,   species = "human",   de_method = "DESeq2",   condition_reference,   condition_test,   filter_min_count = 10,   filter_min_prop = 0.5,   batch_correction = TRUE,   corr_method = "pearson",   alpha = 0.05,   lfc_cutoff = 1,   run_ora = TRUE,   run_gsea = TRUE,   gmt_dir = NULL,   gmt_files = NULL,   gmt_terms = NULL,   output_dir = "rnaseqDegy_output",   prefix = NULL )

title: run_rnaseqDegy ‚Äî run_rnaseqDegy
text: counts Path count matrix (TSV) design Path design matrix (TSV) species "human" "mouse" de_method "DESeq2" "edgeR" condition_reference Reference condition condition_test Test/contrast condition filter_min_count Minimum count per sample (default 10) filter_min_prop Minimum proportion samples (default 0.5) batch_correction Logical, PCA batch correction (TRUE/FALSE) corr_method Correlation method: "pearson", "spearman", "kendall" alpha FDR cutoff (default 0.05) lfc_cutoff Log2FC threshold (default 1) run_ora Logical, run ORA run_gsea Logical, run GSEA gmt_dir Directory containing GMT files gmt_files Character vector GMT filenames gmt_terms Optional character vector GO/GMT terms output_dir Output directory prefix Optional prefix output files

title: run_rnaseqDegy ‚Äî run_rnaseqDegy
text: Invisibly returns output directory path.
